rooms.name: Spawn Room
descriptions: You are inside of a dimly lit room with torches on the walls. Tiled stone covers the floor. You can see four legendary weapons in front of you. The room has one exit leading West.
You are inside of a dimly lit room with torches on the walls. Tiled stone covers the floor. You can see four legendary weapons in front of you. The room has one exit leading West.
You are inside of a dimly lit room with torches on the walls. Tiled stone covers the floor. You can see four legendary weapons in front of you. The room has one exit leading West.

rooms.name: Test Dummy Room
descriptions: There is a skeleton, but it doesn't look like it wants to hurt you. Try hitting it. The room has one exit leading West.
A defenseless skeleton stands in the middle of the room. Try hitting it. The room has one exit leading West.
A skeleton stands in the centre of the room. It doesn't have a weapon. Try hitting it. The room has one exit leading West.

rooms.name: Boon Room
descriptions: You are in a room with three glowing boons; blessings from the gods. They glow bright, illuminating the room. The room has one exit heading West.
You are in a room with three glowing boons; blessings from the gods. They glow bright, illuminating the room. The room has one exit heading West.
You are in a room with three glowing boons; blessings from the gods. They glow bright, illuminating the room. The room has one exit heading West.

rooms.name: F1 1st Attack Room
descriptions: You enter a room with lanterns scattered across the room. The flame glows purple. The stone floor is perfect for agile combat. The room has two exits heading South and West.
You enter a room with lanterns scattered across the room. The flame glows green. The stone floor has cracks throughout. The room has two exits heading South and West.
You enter a room with lanterns scattered across the room. The flame glows red. The stone floor beneath you feels solid. The room has two exits heading South and West.

rooms.name: F1 2nd Attack Room
descriptions: You enter an eerie room. The stone floor is cracked. Those lanterns, they seem to have something inside of them... The room has two exits heading North and West.
You enter an eerie room. The walls have terrifying imagery etched into them. Those lanterns, they seem to have something inside of them... The room has two exits heading North and West.
You enter an eerie room. Prideful statues decorate the alcoves in the wall. Those lanterns, they seem to have something inside of them... The room has two exits heading North and West.

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room
descriptions: You enter an old room. Cracked stone tiles overgrown with moss cover the walls. The floor is bloodied from previous battles. There are two exits heading South and West.
You enter an old room. Cracked stone tiles overgrown with moss cover the walls. The floor is tainted from previous battles. There are two exits heading South and West.
You enter an old room. Cracked stone tiles overgrown with moss cover the walls. There are skeletal remains scattered throughout. There are two exits heading South and West.

rooms.name: F1 NPC Room
descriptions: There's someone there... The room has an exit heading West.
There's someone there... The room has an exit heading West.
There's someone there... The room has an exit heading West.

rooms.name: Miniboss Room
descriptions: The air around you chills, and the smell of ash fills the room. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... The room has one exit leading West.
The air around you chills, and the putrid smell of a decaying corpse fills the room. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... The room has one exit leading West.
The air around you chills, and the faint sound of laughter can be heard. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... The room has one exit leading West.

rooms.name: F1 4th Attack Room
descriptions: You enter a well-lit room. You can see the River Styx off on your left, a sight to behold indeed. There are two exits leading South and West.
You enter a well-lit room. You can see the River Styx off on your left, it looked more grand in the books. There are two exits leading South and West.
You enter a well-lit room. You can see the River Styx off on your left, it's scarier in-person. There are two exits leading South and West.

rooms.name: F1 5th Attack Room
descriptions: You enter a creepy room. The glow of the lanterns becomes visible. You see the clawing of desperate souls, trapped inside the eternal flames. The room has two exits leading North and West.
You enter a creepy room. The glow of the lanterns becomes visible. You see the clawing of desperate souls, trapped inside the ever-burning flames. The room has two exits leading North and West.
You enter a creepy room. The glow of the lantern becomes visible. You see the clawing of desperate souls, trapped inside the flames of torment. The room has two exits leading North and West.

rooms.name: F1 6th Attack Room
descriptions: You enter a foggy room. It's difficult to see, but you can hear the rattling of bones coming ever so closer. There are two exits heading South and West.
You enter a foggy room. It's difficult to see, but you can hear the clanking of bones coming ever so closer. There are two exits heading South and West.
You enter a foggy room. It's difficult to see, but you can hear the chattering of bones coming ever so closer. There are two exits heading South and West.

rooms.name: F1 Shop Room
descriptions: An eerie presence fills the room... There is an exit heading West.
An eerie presence fills the room... There is an exit heading West.
An eerie presence fills the room... There is an exit heading West.

rooms.name: Boss Room
descriptions: Scratch marks trace the walls, bones are scattered everywhere, and blood trails the decaying corpses. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... There aren't any doors, just a series of ledges leading Up.

Scratch marks trace the walls, bones are scattered everywhere, and blood trails the decaying corpses. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... There aren't any doors, just a series of ledges leading Up.

Scratch marks trace the walls, bones are scattered everywhere, and blood trails the decaying corpses. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... There aren't any doors, just a series of ledges leading Up.

rooms.name: F2 Starting Room
descriptions: As you scale the ledges, you encounter a narrow tunnel. You're greeted by a large vortex formed by the weaving of a spider. It leads into what is known as the Infested Pit... The room has one exit heading East.

As you scale the ledges, you encounter a narrow tunnel. You're greeted by a colossal vortex formed by the weaving of a spider. It leads into what is known as the Infested Pit... The room has one exit heading East.

As you scale the ledges, you encounter a narrow tunnel. You're greeted by a vast vortex formed by the weaving of a spider. It leads into what is known as the Infested Pit... The room has one exit heading East.

rooms.name: F2 1st Attack Room
descriptions: The vortex leads you into an old, decrepit room. Moss covers the walls, with cobwebs spun in the corners. A spider egg sits prompt in the middle of the room. There are two exits heading East and South.
The vortex leads you into an old, decrepit room. Vines cover the walls, with cobwebs spun in the corners. A cluster of spider eggs lays in the corner. There are two exits heading East and South.
The vortex leads you into an old, decrepit room. Moss covers the floor, with cobwebs spun in the corners. You see a spider egg off to the side. There are two exits heading East and South.

rooms.name: F2 2nd Attack Room
descriptions: As you venture further, the area once again narrows. Cobwebs and moss cover the floor. You smell something vile up ahead. There are two exits heading North and East.
As you venture further, the area once again narrows. Cobwebs are spun around the entrances. You smell something vile up ahead. There are two exits heading North and East.
As you venture further, the area once again narrows. Vines cover the walls. You smell something vile up ahead. There are two exits heading North and East.

rooms.name: F2 3rd Attack Room
descriptions: Following the cracked stone path, you come up to a large room. Chains hang from the ceiling, and webs stretch across the room. The room has two exits heading South and East.
Following the cryptic stone path, you come up to a large room. Chains hang from the ceiling, and webs stretch across the room. The room has two exits heading South and East.
Following the old stone path, you come up to a large room. Chains hang from the ceiling, and webs stretch across the room. The room has two exits heading South and East.

rooms.name: F2 4th Attack Room
descriptions: The path converges into another large room. Cobwebs crowded the entrance, and puddles of an unknown liquid lace the floor. The room has two exits heading East and North.
The path converges into another large room. Cobwebs are strung across the room, and droplets of an unknown liquid are seen coming from the spider. The room has two exits heading East and North.
The path converges into another large room. There are cobwebs in the corners of the room. An unknown liquid oozes from the spider. The room has two exits heading East and North.

rooms.name: F2 5th Attack Room
descriptions: Walking through the door, you see a corpse, barely breathing. Any hopes you had of helping him are crushed when the spider slams his head into the floor. There are two exits heading East and South.

Walking through the door, you see a corpse, barely breathing. Any hopes you had of helping him are crushed when the spider pierces his mouth with its mandibles. There are two exits heading East and South.
Walking through the door, you see a corpse, barely breathing. Any hopes you had of helping him are crushed when the spider digs a hole into his back. There are two exits heading East and South.

rooms.name: F2 NPC Room
descriptions: Following the stone path, you come across a warming atmosphere. There are no cobwebs, and the room is well-kept. Lanterns scour the floor, making traversal easy. There is one exit heading East.
Following the stone path, you come across a warming atmosphere. There are no cobwebs, and the room is well-kept. Lanterns scour the floor, making traversal easy. There is one exit heading East.
Following the stone path, you come across a warming atmosphere. There are no cobwebs, and the room is well-kept. Lanterns scour the floor, making traversal easy. There is one exit heading East.

rooms.name: Miniboss Room
descriptions: The room is filled with fog and webs. Eggs litter the floor. Skinned corpses lay next to them, lifeless. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... There is one exit heading East.

The room is filled with fog and webs. Eggs litter the floor. Skinned corpses lay next to them, lifeless. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... There is one exit heading East.

The room is filled with fog and webs. Eggs litter the floor. Skinned corpses lay next to them, lifeless. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... There is one exit heading East.

rooms.name: F2 6th Attack Room
descriptions: Escaping the Queen Spider, you wonder what lurks ahead... Sharp stalactites hang from the ceiling, with webs stringing the pillars together. There are two exits heading East and North.
Escaping the Queen Spider, you wonder what lurks ahead... Sharp stalagmites engulf the floor beneath, leaving you on an uneven battlefield. There are two exits heading East and North.
Escaping the Queen Spider, you wonder what lurks ahead... It's hard to see, stalactites and stalagmites make the room difficult to traverse. There are two exits heading East and North.

rooms.name: F2 7th Attack Room
descriptions: As you travel deeper into the Infested Pit, you see beautifully-spun webs. True works of art, which must've taken years. It's a shame you're about to destroy it all... There are two exits heading East and South.

As you travel deeper into the Infested Pit, you see beautifully-spun webs. Years of web-spinning has led to such perfection. It's a shame you're about to destroy it all... There are two exits heading East and South.

As you travel deeper into the Infested Pit, you see beautifully-spun webs. You've got to take a second to take it all in. It's a shame you're about to destroy it all... There are two exits heading East and South.

rooms.name: F2 8th Attack Room
descriptions: That unidentifiable liquid is dripping from the ceiling. You see a spider in the centre of its newly-spun web. You see the liquid dripping from its mandibles. There are two exits heading East and North.
That unidentifiable liquid is dripping from the ceiling. You see a spider in the centre of its newly-spun web. You see the liquid dripping from its fangs. There are two exits heading East and North.

That unidentifiable liquid is dripping from the ceiling. You see a spider in the centre of a web in front of the exits. You see the liquid dripping from its mandibles. There are two exits heading East and North.

rooms.name: F2 9th Attack Room
descriptions: The room has no webs, but you quickly realize they aren't needed. A spider at least twice the size of you crawls out from the darkest corner in the room. Its abdomen twitches, and its eyes glow red. Something's off... There are two exits heading East and South

The room has no webs, but you realize they aren't needed. A spider at least twice the size of you crawls out from the darkest corner in the room. Its eyes are bulging and glowing red. Something's off... There are two exits heading East and South

The room has no webs, but you realize they aren't needed. A spider at least twice the size of you crawls out from the darkest corner in the room. Its abdomen twitches, and its eyes glow red. Something's off... There are two exits heading East and South

rooms.name: F2 10th Attack Room
descriptions: A pitch-black room. A place where this spider was contained. It's eyes are missing, and some of its legs are bigger than the others. A disgusting monster. There are two exits heading East and North.
A pitch-black room. A place where this spider was contained. It's screech is distorted, and its abdomen pulsates irregularly. A vile monster. There are two exits heading East and North.

A pitch-black room. A place where this spider was contained. Half it's eyes are bulging, and the other half are missing. It screeches in agony. A sickening monster. There are two exits heading East and North.

rooms.name: F2 Shop Room
descriptions: An eerie presence fills the room... There is one exit heading East.
An eerie presence fills the room... There is one exit heading East.
An eerie presence fills the room... There is one exit heading East.

rooms.name: Boss Room
descriptions: Corpses. Human and spider alike. Across the room, you see a large tarantula, piercing the bodies of its prey, injecting its blood into them. These are its experiments... and you're next. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... You'll have to climb Up to escape the Infested Pit.

Corpses. Human and spider alike. Across the room, you see a large tarantula, forcing its prety to drink its blood. These are its experiments... and you're next. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... You'll have to climb Up to escape the Infested Pit.

Corpses. Human and spider alike. Across the room, you see a large tarantula, laughing maniacally while injecting its blood into them. These are its experiments... and you're next. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... You'll have to climb Up to escape the Infested Pit.

rooms.name: F3 Starting Room
descriptions: Grasping the final ledge, you escape the pit. A golden sign at the top reads "Welcome to Elysium, Land of Heroes". The fields of Elysium are truly beautiful. There is one exit heading West.
Grasping the final ledge, you escape the pit. A golden sign at the top reads "Welcome to Elysium, Land of Heroes". It looks even better than what's in the books. There is one exit heading West.

Grasping the final ledge, you escape the pit. A golden sign at the top reads "Welcome to Elysium, Land of Heroes". Stories could've never told me how beautiful Elysium truly is. There is one exit heading West.

rooms.name: F3 1st Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see bright green soul torches lighting the way to a maze. Inside the maze you can see exits West and South being guarded by a man with a hammer in hand.
As you enter the room you can see bright green soul torches lighting the way to a maze. Inside the maze you can see exits West and South being guarded by a man with a hammer in hand.
As you enter the room you can see bright green soul torches lighting the way to a maze. Inside the maze you can see exits West and South being guarded by a man with a hammer in hand.

rooms.name: F3 2nd Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see a man on a Pegasus looking at your in a massive colosseum. The colosseum is lit up by soul torches glowing orange with exits heading West and North.
As you enter the room you can see a man on a Pegasus looking at your in a massive colosseum. The colosseum is lit up by soul torches glowing orange with exits heading West and North.
As you enter the room you can see a man on a Pegasus looking at your in a massive colosseum. The colosseum is lit up by soul torches glowing orange with exits heading West and North.

rooms.name: F3 3rd Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see a man with a sickle looking at you guarding both exits heading West and South. The room is being lit up by soul lanterns glowing green.
As you enter the room you can see a man with a sickle looking at you guarding both exits heading West and South. The room is being lit up by soul lanterns glowing green.
As you enter the room you can see a man with a sickle looking at you guarding both exits heading West and South. The room is being lit up by soul lanterns glowing green.

rooms.name: F3 4th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can tell it resembles a theatre with a man standing at the front with a lyre in hand playing music. The room is lit up with soul lanterns glowing orange with the only exits of the room heading West and North.

As you enter the room you can tell it resembles a theatre with a man standing at the front with a lyre in hand playing music. The room is lit up with soul lanterns glowing orange with the only exits of the room heading West and North.

As you enter the room you can tell it resembles a theatre with a man standing at the front with a lyre in hand playing music. The room is lit up with soul lanterns glowing orange with the only exits of the room heading West and North.

rooms.name: F3 5th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can tell you have entered a golden palace with a man sitting on a golden throne guarding both exits that are heading West and South. The room is being lit up by gold lanterns that are glowing yellow.

As you enter the room you can tell you have entered a golden palace with a man sitting on a golden throne guarding both exits that are heading West and South. The room is being lit up by gold lanterns that are glowing yellow.

As you enter the room you can tell you have entered a golden palace with a man sitting on a golden throne guarding both exits that are heading West and South. The room is being lit up by gold lanterns that are glowing yellow.

rooms.name: F3 6th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see a man with an eagle on his shoulder with a liver in its mouth. The room is being lit up by fires scattered around the room with exits heading West and North.
As you enter the room you can see a man with an eagle on his shoulder with a liver in its mouth. The room is being lit up by fires scattered around the room with exits heading West and North.
As you enter the room you can see a man with an eagle on his shoulder with a liver in its mouth. The room is being lit up by fires scattered around the room with exits heading West and North.

rooms.name: F3 7th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see a giant hill with no other distinctive feautures other then the green torches lighting up the room. The only exits out of the room you can see are heading West and South.

As you enter the room you can see a giant hill with no other distinctive feautures other then the green torches lighting up the room. The only exits out of the room you can see are heading West and South.

As you enter the room you can see a giant hill with no other distinctive feautures other then the green torches lighting up the room. The only exits out of the room you can see are heading West and South.

rooms.name: F3 NPC Room
descriptions: As you enter the brightly lit up room you can see a few statues of old heros carved in stone with a man sitting in the middle of the room. The man is has dark skin with a robe and spear looking as if he is bored and looks at you. The only exit to the room is heading West.

As you enter the brightly lit up room you can see a few statues of old heros carved in stone with a man sitting in the middle of the room. The man is has dark skin with a robe and spear looking as if he is bored and looks at you. The only exit to the room is heading West.

As you enter the brightly lit up room you can see a few statues of old heros carved in stone with a man sitting in the middle of the room. The man is has dark skin with a robe and spear looking as if he is bored and looks at you. The only exit to the room is heading West.

rooms.name: Miniboss Room
descriptions: A chilling presence surrounds you. An unimaginable monster, limbs and bones, held together by nothing but bloody, rusted chains. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... There is one exit heading West.

A chilling presence surrounds you. An unimaginable monster, limbs and bones, held together by nothing but bloody, rusted chains. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... There is one exit heading West.

A chilling presence surrounds you. An unimaginable monster, limbs and bones, held together by nothing but bloody, rusted chains. Maybe the gods will bless you after killing whatever lurks here... There is one exit heading West.

rooms.name: F3 8th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can feel the powers of the god coming from someone in the room. The room is being lit up by the torches glowing orange in the marbled room with exits heading West and South.
As you enter the room you can feel the powers of the god coming from someone in the room. The room is being lit up by the torches glowing orange in the marbled room with exits heading West and South.
As you enter the room you can feel the powers of the god coming from someone in the room. The room is being lit up by the torches glowing orange in the marbled room with exits heading West and South.

rooms.name: F3 9th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you see similar features to the other palace you were in when you defeated midas but not gold but just as majestic. The room is being lit up by bright torches glowing orange with exits out of the room heading West and North with a man sitting on the throne blocking the exits

As you enter the room you see similar features to the other palace you were in when you defeated midas but not gold but just as majestic. The room is being lit up by bright torches glowing orange with exits out of the room heading West and North with a man sitting on the throne blocking the exits

As you enter the room you see similar features to the other palace you were in when you defeated midas but not gold but just as majestic. The room is being lit up by bright torches glowing orange with exits out of the room heading West and North with a man sitting on the throne blocking the exits

rooms.name: F3 10th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you realize the room is actually a colosseum being lit up with torches lighting up the room orange with a man blocking the only exits that are heading West and South.
As you enter the room you realize the room is actually a colosseum being lit up with torches lighting up the room orange with a man blocking the only exits that are heading West and South.
As you enter the room you realize the room is actually a colosseum being lit up with torches lighting up the room orange with a man blocking the only exits that are heading West and South.

rooms.name: F3 11th Attack Room
descriptions: As you once again enter another palace you can see murals of an epic 10 year long journey with a man sitting on a throne blocking the exits leading North and West.
As you once again enter another palace you can see murals of an epic 10 year long journey with a man sitting on a throne blocking the exits leading North and West.
As you once again enter another palace you can see murals of an epic 10 year long journey with a man sitting on a throne blocking the exits leading North and West.

rooms.name: F3 12th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter another palace once again outside of the windows you can see the golden fleece outside at the docks with a man sitting on a throne blocking the exits heading West and South.
As you enter another palace once again outside of the windows you can see the golden fleece outside at the docks with a man sitting on a throne blocking the exits heading West and South.
As you enter another palace once again outside of the windows you can see the golden fleece outside at the docks with a man sitting on a throne blocking the exits heading West and South.

rooms.name: F3 13th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter another colosseum you can see a majestic man standing in the middle of the colosseum blocking the only exits heading West and North.
As you enter another colosseum you can see a majestic man standing in the middle of the colosseum blocking the only exits heading West and North.
As you enter another colosseum you can see a majestic man standing in the middle of the colosseum blocking the only exits heading West and North.

rooms.name: F3 14th Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see murals detailing 12 trials with the room being lit up by torches lighting up the room orange. The rooms exits that head West and South are being blocked by a man staring at you.

As you enter the room you can see murals detailing 12 trials with the room being lit up by torches lighting up the room orange. The rooms exits that head West and South are being blocked by a man staring at you.

As you enter the room you can see murals detailing 12 trials with the room being lit up by torches lighting up the room orange. The rooms exits that head West and South are being blocked by a man staring at you.

rooms.name: F3 Shop Room
descriptions: An eerie presence fills the room... There is one exit heading East.
An eerie presence fills the room... There is one exit heading East.
An eerie presence fills the room... There is one exit heading East.

rooms.name: Boss Room
descriptions: A hallway of golden statues of the greatest heroes leads you down to the exit at the end of the hallway. Guarding this door stands a reaper, scythe in hand. Doesn't look like he's letting you out easy... The exit leads West.

A hallway of golden statues of heroes favoured by the gods leads you down to the exit at the end of the hallway. Guarding this door stands a reaper, scythe in hand. Doesn't look like he's letting you out easy... The exit leads West.

A hallway of golden statues of the most respected heroes leads you down to the exit at the end of the hallway. Guarding this door stands a reaper, scythe in hand. Doesn't look like he's letting you out easy... The exit leads West.

rooms.name: The Gateway to the Mortal Plane
descriptions: You're finally here. Sunlight streams in from the sky above, and you feel the breeze of cool air blowing against your skin. Continue upwards to reach the surface world.

You're finally here. Sunlight streams in from the sky above. You feel the air flowing against your skin; the sensation of a summer breeze is one you miss ever so dearly. Continue upwards to reach the surface world.
You're finally here. Sunlight streams in from the sky above, inviting you to once again exoerience the beauty of the world. Continue upwards to reach the surface world.

rooms.name: Ending
descriptions: Thank you for playing our text based knock off of Hades, Zorkgreus. Creators: Harrison Cazzin, Fred He, Kyle Jackson, and Richie Tran.
Thank you for playing our text based knock off of Hades, Zorkgreus. Creators: Kyle Jackson, Richie Tran, Fred He, and Harrison Cazzin.
Thank you for playing our text based game Zorkgreus from the creators of Zorkgreus Fred He, Kyle Jackson, Harrison Cazzin, Richie Tran.
